title: Lynda.com - WordPress Quick Tips: Migration and Database Reset
description:
What happens if you need to move your WordPress site? Maybe you found a better hosting service, got your own domain name, or maybe youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re finally ready to move to production. This course offers an advanced way to migrate a WordPress site from one location to another by duplicating and resetting the database. Let Morten Rand-Hendriksen guide you through the five steps of migration, and get you up and running in your new location.

Note: This method creates a new duplicate of the original website, but it requires detailed database work and effectively results in a hard reset of the target site. Proceed carefully.
